articles.description: ISL 2020-21 HIGHLIGHTS, ATK Mohun Bagan vs NorthEast United: Benjamin Lambot own goal and Roy Krishna header gives ATKMB the win that takes them back to the top of the table. Scoreline:- ATK Mohun Bagan 2-0 NorthEast United FC

articles.description: Lautaro Martinez scored three goals for Inter in their 6-2 win vs. Crotone. Martinez managed his first hattrick for Inter as he starts off 2021 in great form. Crotone took the 1-0 lead but it was Lautaro who scored the equaliser. He would fight off the defend…

articles.description: Arjun Tendulkar, Sachin Tendulkar's son, has been named in the 22-member squad named for the upcoming Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, which will be played this month.
